content:
Hi,

On every page just above "Powered by Backdrop CMS" there is an image of a dragon sitting on the footer.
I have looked into the configure footer options but there is no option to change or delete the dragon.
How do I edit this, for example, change the image or remove the image so that future pages added will have my custom changes automatically?

Thanks

The dragon image is part of the "Powered by Backdrop" block when used in the default theme, Basis. So you can either:

  • Remove the "Powered by Backdrop" block
  • Change the theme to a different one
  • Add some custom CSS to your theme to hide the image

I'll take a look at that.
Thanks.
